title: T206 Cy Young bare hand PSA 2Mk

posts.post_title: T206 Cy Young bare hand PSA 2Mk
posts.post_content:
No longer available[QUOTE][STRIKE]$640 No fees payment or $660 Regular paypal.[/QUOTE][/STRIKE]

Price includes insurance and certified mail shipping.

The mark is the "o" on the center right. The diagonal mark on the bottom
left corner is a plate scratch from the factory printing plate.
